name: PoleOut
description:
Some simple game i made long time ago (that i decide to finish it now) about seal breaking ice with snow ball in breakout style. but the catch is snowball can't destroy packed ice so only way to bypass it is using a screen warp (idk lol, i'm drunk)

how to play (very simple)

  • use arrow key to control player 1
  • use A D to control player 2
  • don't try to get hit by snowball
  • multiplayer game can be both co-op or vs as players decide without selecting mode at menu
  • why are 2 seals fighting each other? i don't know lol

Everything in game is made by me
